H0.text: Darwin wrote the book on the origin of species.

H1.text: Scopes wrote the book on the origin of species.

H2.text: Sagan wrote the book on the origin of species.

H3.text: Cannon is the author of the book on the origin of species.

A4.text: Darwin published his theory of evolution with compelling evidence in On the Origin of Species (1859).

A5.text: On the Origin of Species proved unexpectedly popular, with the entire stock of 1,250 copies oversubscribed when it went on sale to booksellers on 22 November 1859.
